name: ALONE (itch) (Willhart-H)
description:
ALONE is a game where you can chose ONLY ONE way to go. Combine letters to make up your mind on what to do. 

This game was mostly made by just experimenting on game maker 8.1. I have never made a complete game with it before. The music and the sound effects were made by me, and the drawings are quick things from me too. This is not a horror game, even though the style might elude to it.

I hope you enjoy the game.

Update: Moved the game to the Game Maker Studio, to make it work better with new computers and so on.

The font used is from here: http://fingerfont.neofelis.fi/
